Class MainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • fr.irit.smac.amak.ui.MainWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class MainWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This window is the main one of an AMAS developed using AMAK. It contains a toolbar panel and various spaces for panels
    Author:
    Alexandre Perles, Marcillaud Guilhem
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
